info.title: TS 28.532 Fault Supervision Management Service
info.description: OAS 3.0.0 specification for the Fault Management Service (Fault MnS)

get.description: Retrieve the alarms identified by alarmAckState, href and filter.

200.description: Success case ("200 OK"). Returns the alarms identified in the request.

post.summary: Add a comment to multiple alarms
post.description: Add a comment to multiple alarms

parameters.name: alarmId
parameters.description: Identifies the alarms to which the comment shall be added

201.description: Success case. The representation of the newly created comment resource shall be returned.

patch.summary: Clear, acknowledge or unacknowledge multiple alarms

parameters.name: alarmId
parameters.description: Identifies the alarms to be patched. The type shall be

204.description: In case of success, the response body shall be empty.

get.summary: Get the alarm count per perceived severity

200.description: Success case ("200 OK"). The alarm count per perceived severity is returned

default.description: Response in case of error. The error case needs rework.

patch.summary: Clear, acknowledge or unacknowledge a single alarm
patch.description: Clear, acknowledge or uncknowldege a single alarm by patching the alarm information

parameters.name: alarmId
parameters.description: Identifies the alarm to be patched.

parameters.name: perceivedSeverity
parameters.description: This parameter may be present when acknowledging an alarm. For other patch actions it shall be absent.

default.description: Response in case of error. The error case needs rework.

post.summary: Add a comment to a single alarm
post.description: Add a comment to an alarm identified by alarmId.

parameters.name: alarmId
parameters.description: Identifies the alarm to which the comment shall be added.

201.description: Success case. The representation of the newly created comment resource shall be returned.

post.description: To create a subscription the representation of the subscription is POSTed on the /subscriptions collection resource.

201.description: Success case ("201 Created"). The representation of the newly created subscription resource shall be returned.

204.description: Success case ("204 No Content"). The notification is successfully delivered. The response message body is absent.
Success case ("204 No Content"). The notification is successfully delivered. The response message body is absent.

Success case ("204 No Content"). The notification is successfully delivered. The response message body is absent.

delete.summary: Delete all subscriptions made with a specific consumerReferenceId
delete.description: The subscriptions are deleted by deleting the corresponding subscription resources. The resources to be deleted are identified with the path component of the URI pointing to the /subscription collection resource and filtering on the consumerReferenceId provided in the query part.

parameters.name: consumerReferenceId
parameters.description: Identifies the subscriptions to be deleted.

204.description: Success case ("204 No Content"). The subscription resources have been deleted. The response message body is absent.

delete.description: The subscription is deleted by deleting the corresponding subscription resource. The resource to be deleted is identified with the path component of the URI.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Identifies the subscription to be deleted.

204.description: Success case ("204 No Content"). The subscription resource has been deleted. The response message body is absent.

header-Type.description: Header used in notifications as notification header and as header in the alarm resource

patchAcknowledgeAlarms-RequestType.description: Used to patch alarm attributes to acknowledge one or multiple alarm

patchUnacknowledgeAlarms-RequestType.description: Used to patch alarm attributes to unacknowledge one or multiple alarm

patchClearAlarms-RequestType.description: Used to patch the attributes related to clear
